The ceramic figurine shown from Tlatilco, Central Mexico, is characterized by

choices.label: a lack of attention to the hands and feet
molded patterns on the hair and skirt
static gestures and an indifferent expression
a composite pose that shows multiple angles

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
